item.title: 贝利警告贸易战将在英国央行预测前打击英国经济增长
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）警告说，尽管英国在关税方面享有优惠待遇，但由美国主导的贸易战仍将损害英国经济。此前，一项衡量私营部门活动的指标显示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的全球征税导致英国经济急剧下滑。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey warned that the US-led trade war would harm the UK economy despite preferential treatment on tariffs, after a gauge of private sector activity showed a steep drop due to President Donald Trump’s global levies.】

item.title: 库克斯说，德国总是愿意在 "困难时期 "花钱
item.description: 德国财政部长约尔格-库基斯（Joerg Kukies）说，德国从未在国家陷入困境时缩减开支。【原文：Germany never has held back on spending when the country was in trouble, Finance Minister Joerg Kukies said.】

item.title: 台积电尖端 A14 芯片技术将于 2028 年投产
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. plans to begin production with its A14 fabrication process in 2028, aiming to remain at the cutting edge of the chip industry.】

item.title: 印度称关税可能使经济增长减少半个百分点
item.description: 印度政府一位高级官员表示，美国对印度征收的关税可能会使印度的经济增长减少多达半个百分点。【原文：US tariffs on India could shave up to half a percentage point off the country’s economic growth, a top Indian government official said, adding that a more significant problem would be the global economy slumping.】

item.title: 贝莱德 iShares 加拿大主管在重组中离职
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份内部备忘录，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s head of iShares in Canada, Helen Hayes, has left the firm as part of a broader restructuring, according to an internal memo seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 贝尔德增加债券基金现金以抵御动荡
item.description: 贝尔德正在增加其市政债券基金的现金头寸，以应对本月关税引发的抛售。【原文：Baird is increasing cash positions within its municipal-bond funds in response to a tariff-induced selloff this month.】

item.title: 贝森特称日本会谈 "不寻求货币目标
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，特朗普政府在与日本的会谈中不会追求具体的汇率目标，而是重申其前任要求东京遵守七国集团长期承诺的呼吁。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Trump administration won’t be pursuing specific exchange-rate targets in its talks with Japan, instead reiterating his predecessor’s calls for Tokyo to abide by long-standing Group of Seven commitments.】

item.title: 贸易担忧主导美联储《米色报告》，经济活动变化不大
item.description: 根据美联储《米色手册》（Beige Book）对各地区联络人的调查，最近几周，唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国贸易伙伴加征关税的不确定性在全国各地弥漫开来。【原文：Uncertainty over President Donald Trump’s heightened use of tariffs on US trading partners loomed large across the country in recent weeks, according to the Federal Reserve’s Beige Book survey of regional contacts.】

item.title: 非行称津巴布韦寻求 26 亿美元过桥融资以彻底解决债务问题
item.description: 非洲开发银行（African Development Bank）称，津巴布韦已提议寻求 26 亿美元的过桥融资，以帮助其清偿拖欠国际金融机构的债务，因为该国正试图打破可追溯到 1999 年的债务僵局。【原文：The African Development Bank said Zimbabwe has proposed seeking $2.6 billion in bridge finance to help it clear arrears owed to international financial institutions as it attempts to break a debt impasse dating back to 1999.】

item.title: 欧佩克+与哈萨克斯坦的紧张关系沸腾导致油价下跌
item.description: 欧佩克+组织（OPEC+）惩罚石油配额作弊者的大胆举措促使周三原油再次暴跌，与哈萨克斯坦日益紧张的关系加剧了人们对价格战升级的担忧。【原文：OPEC+’s audacious bid to punish its oil-quota cheats prompted a renewed plunge in crude on Wednesday, as growing tensions with Kazakhstan stoked fears of an escalating price war.】

item.title: 特朗普考验美联储自主权，鲍威尔尝试平衡之术
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的第二个任期伊始，就重新下定决心要遏制美联储珍视的自主权。杰罗姆-鲍威尔迄今为止的回应是：努力围绕货币政策独立性划出一条鲜明的界线，即使这意味着在其他方面似乎要让步。【原文：Donald Trump’s second term has begun with a renewed determination to curb the Federal Reserve’s treasured autonomy. Jerome Powell’s response so far: trying to draw a sharp line around monetary policy independence, even if it means appearing to give ground elsewhere.】

item.title: 谷歌阻止摩托罗拉使用 Perplexity 人工智能，证人作证
item.description: 谷歌与联想集团有限公司旗下的摩托罗拉公司签订的合同阻止了这家智能手机制造商将 Perplexity AI 设置为其新设备的默认助手，这家初创公司的一位高管在搜索巨头的反垄断审判中作证。【原文：Google’s contract with Lenovo Group Ltd.’s Motorola blocked the smartphone maker from setting Perplexity AI as the default assistant on its new devices, an executive of the startup testified at the search giant’s antitrust trial.】

item.title: 散户交易员从 S&P 的剧烈波动中看到了绝佳的买入机会
item.description: Mike Schiemer 可能没有华尔街交易员的血统，但这位 39 岁的数字营销专家坚信，他在股市中找到了一笔令人尖叫的交易。【原文：Mike Schiemer may lack the pedigree of a Wall Street trader, but the 39-year-old digital marketing specialist is confident he’s found a screaming deal in the stock market.】

item.title: 马斯克的 Neuralink 公司希望以 85 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃隆-马斯克的 Neuralink 公司正计划以 85 亿美元的投前估值融资约 5 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk’s Neuralink is planning to raise about $500 million at a pre-money valuation of $8.5 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 股市恐慌不仅与特朗普有关
item.description: 债券义警似乎又抓到了一个受害者，那就是唐纳德-特朗普。【原文：It seems the bond vigilantes have claimed another victim — Donald Trump.】

item.title: 瑞银再次下调美元前景，称中美是美元走势的关键
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）旗下的一个部门在不到两个月的时间里第二次下调了美元预期，理由是美元的表现取决于中美贸易对峙的结果。【原文：A unit of UBS Group AG cut its dollar forecast for the second time in under two months citing that the greenback’s performance hinges on the outcome of the US-China trade face-off.】

item.title: 他们耍了我们永远 21 的供应商蔑视零售商破产
item.description: 当 Forever 21 的美国运营商要求 Kyuseung Ahn 位于首尔的运动服装供应商 Leukon Inc.对 Ahn 而言，一切照旧：货物已交付，3 月 14 日，两人开始互通电子邮件。【原文：When Forever 21’s US operator asked for a discount of as much as 50% on a shipment from Kyuseung Ahn’s Seoul-based activewear supplier Leukon Inc., Ahn agreed to the American fast-fashion chain’s demands. For Ahn, it was business as usual: the goods were delivered and the two were exchanging emails on March 14.】

item.title: 丰业银行经济学家抨击加拿大两大党派政纲
item.description: 加拿大最大的贷款机构之一的经济学家对该国大选中主要政党提出的财政计划表示怀疑。【原文：Economists at one of Canada’s biggest lenders are raising doubts about the fiscal plans offered by the leading parties in the country’s election.】

item.title: 穆勒称欧洲央行利率可能因贸易问题而降至中性以下
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒（Madis Muller）表示，如果贸易不确定性被证明对经济增长的破坏性更大，欧洲中央银行可能不得不将利率降至刺激经济的水平。【原文：The European Central Bank may have to lower interest rates to levels that stimulate the economy if trade uncertainty proves more damaging for growth, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Madis Muller.】

item.title: 特朗普关闭漏洞后，英国重新审议包裹免税问题
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税后，英国计划对低价值进口商品的免税地位进行审查，因为人们担心大量中国产品可能会从美国改道进入英国和周边市场。【原文：The UK plans to review the duty-free status of low-value imports after President Donald Trump’s tariffs raised fears that a flood of Chinese products could be rerouted from the US into Britain and neighboring markets.】

item.title: Discord 任命新首席执行官，联合创始人在首次公开募股前卸任
item.description: 流行聊天应用 Discord Inc. 任命了新的首席执行官，接替联合创始人兼现任首席执行官 Jason Citron。【原文：Discord Inc., the popular chat app, named a new chief executive officer, replacing co-founder and current CEO Jason Citron.】

item.title: 拉加德称关税对通胀的影响大于通货紧缩
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，美国加征关税对欧洲而言可能更多是抑制通胀，而非抑制通胀，尽管还需要更多时间来全面评估局势。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said US tariffs may be more disinflationary than inflationary for Europe even as more time is needed to fully assess the situation.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦正与欧佩克+合作解决石油产量问题
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦能源部长埃尔兰-阿肯热诺夫说，哈萨克斯坦正在履行欧佩克+组织的义务，并与该组织合作为其石油生产管理寻找 "双方都能接受的解决方案"。【原文：Kazakhstan is fulfilling its OPEC+ obligations and is working with the group to find “mutually acceptable solutions” to its oil production management, said Energy Minister Erlan Akkenzhenov.】

item.title: 特朗普可能还没和鲍威尔玩完
item.description:
在本期特朗普经济学节目中，我们将讨论他对美联储主席和央行独立性的攻击所产生的长期影响。【原文：

item.title: 千禧年支持的 Kodai 将向所有投资者返还现金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，伊兹-英格兰德的千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）支持的对冲基金 Kodai Capital Management 正在向所有客户返还资金。【原文：Kodai Capital Management, a hedge fund backed by Izzy Englander’s Millennium Management, is returning capital to all clients, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股票同步上涨，你无法超越关税交易
item.description: 交易员们早就知道唐纳德-特朗普打算将关税作为经济政策的工具。一年前，花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Traders have long known Donald Trump intended to use tariffs as a tool for economic policy. Citigroup Inc., a year ago, even offered up a handy framework for trading potential levies on China.】

item.title: 拉加德称鲍威尔正在为美国人民服务
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德支持她的美国同行，称杰罗姆-鲍威尔作为美联储主席正在尽职尽责。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde threw her support behind her US counterpart, saying Jerome Powell is doing what’s required as Federal Reserve chief.】

item.title: 英国儿童安全新规将对 X 上的年龄验证程序提出挑战
item.description: 英国通信监管机构的新规定将对埃隆-马斯克的 X 平台和其他平台处理平台上年龄验证和色情内容的方式提出挑战。【原文：New rules from the UK’s communications regulator are set to challenge the way Elon Musk’s X platform and others handle age verification and pornographic content on their platforms.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长诺特称震荡过后中性是正确的政策取向
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，由于近期经济震荡的中期影响尚不明确，他认为没有必要通过降低利率来刺激经济。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Klaas Knot said he doesn’t see a need to stimulate the economy with lower interest rates as the medium-term impacts of recent economic shocks remain unclear.】

item.title: 巴西央行行长称提高利率正在发挥作用
item.description: 巴西央行货币政策主管尼尔顿-大卫（Nilton David）表示，经济活动和信贷数据显示，提高利率在巴西正在发挥作用。【原文：Economic activity and credit data show that higher rates are working in Brazil, according to the central bank’s director of monetary policy Nilton David.】
